text: (ki kya karen kya na karen) aur agar ye log (ghar se) nikalane kee thaan lete to (kuchh na kuchh saamaan to karate magar (baat ye hai) ki khuda ne unake saath bhejane ko naapasand kiya to unako kaahil bana diya aur (goya) unase kah diya gaya ki tum baithane vaalon ke saath baithe (makkhee maarate) raho
